item.title: Wall Street rallies on Trump's softer approach to Powell, China
item.description: Wall Street is poised to rally Wednesday after President Trump softened his rhetoric on Fed Chair Jerome Powell and China.

item.title: IRS turmoil: Leadership churn, worker exodus and threats to groups' tax-exempt status roil agency
item.description: The height of tax season was the height of turmoil at the IRS. The agency shuffled through three acting directors over the course of a week.

item.title: Cory Bowman, J.D. Vance's half brother, runs for Cincinnati mayor
item.description: Cory Bowman was feeling inspired in January as he headed home after watching his half brother, J.D. Vance, be inaugurated as vice president.

item.title: Gingrich says Trump note shows he wants to avoid raising taxes
item.description: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich said President Trump told him he has no plans to raise taxes on anyone.

item.title: Rep. Barr to run for McConnell's Senate seat in GOP primary
item.description: Rep. Andy Barr announced Tuesday that he will run for Kentucky's U.S. Senate seat in 2026, looking to replace longtime Republican leader Mitch McConne...
